attributes.additional_details: This petition seeks to outlaw the practice of religions in the U.K. which threaten the safety and freedoms enjoyed by the citizens of this country. Any persons found to be making religiously motivated threats and/or advocating violence against the U.K. or U.K. citizens would face a choice of either renouncing their U.K. citizenship and departing the country permanently, or receiving a lengthly mandatory custodial sentance. Practicioners and supporters of extreme interpretations of Islam would be the main focus, as well as any other religions which advocate similar ideologies, either now or in the future.
